events.description: Free very casual chess, every level welcome. Bring your own drinks.
events.title: OTB Southbank

events.description: Join our friendly chess club every Sunday morning! All skill levels welcome, from beginners to masters. Play starts from 11am and finishes around 4pm. Bring your own board if possible, but we'll provide one if needed. Follow us @london_chess_club
events.title: London Chess Club - Chess & Coffee

events.description: Cozy coffeehouse chess every Friday from 6-9pm at Coffee Zee London. Warm environment for casual chess with great coffee and toasted sandwiches. Setup by London Chess Community - chess should be for everyone no matter skill level.
events.title: Coffee Zee Friday Chess

events.description: Weekly social casual chess for women, non-binary players, and girls. All skill levels welcome! Coaching sessions, friendly games, and socializing. Building a safe and engaging space for women in chess.
events.title: London Women Chess Club

events.description: FIDE and ECF rated rapid chess tournament at The Clissold Arms. Open to all players, multiple rounds with prizes for 1st (£100), 2nd (£50), and rating categories. Professional tournament organization.
events.title: Muswell Hill FIDE Rapid

events.description: 6-round FIDE and ECF rated tournaments with four sections: Open, Under 1900, Under 1600, and ECF Under 1100. Must be ECF Gold/Platinum member or pay £15 supplement.
events.title: Golders Green FIDE Rapid

events.description: Monthly FIDE and ECF rated blitz tournament at Cumberland Lawn Tennis Club. 19:30-22:00, anyone can play. Five minutes walk from Finchley Road & Frognal Station.
events.title: Hendon Chess Club Blitz

events.description: Major international chess festival with £4,000 prize fund. 9-round Swiss system, minimum 1900 FIDE rating required. Grandmasters and International Masters competing. Registration capacity 120 players.
events.title: V Mindsports International Festival

events.description: Diverse, sociable chess for everyone in central London. Mixed-gender lessons, courses and events promoting equality and diversity. Free and paid chess lessons available.
events.title: Casual Chess Cafe

events.description: Free chess sessions at Paddington Library. Open to all ages and skill levels. Library provides sets and boards. Great introduction to chess for beginners and casual play for experienced players.
events.title: Chess at Paddington Library

events.description: Three 5-round FIDE and ECF rated tournaments plus ECF Under 1400 section. Four sections: Open, U2000, U1650, and U1400. Professional weekend tournament format at Mindsports Centre.
events.title: London Chess League Weekender

events.description: US Chess-rated game every Tuesday night, completely free for CCC members
events.title: Charlotte Chess Center Tuesday Night Action

events.description: Weekly online tournaments by DMVchess.com since March 2020
events.title: Weekly USCF-Rated Online Tournaments

events.description: 3 round quad tournament grouping players by skill level
events.title: Charlotte Chess Center Wednesday Action Quads

events.description: 4 USCF Rated Games, 25 minutes + 5 second increment
events.title: 4 Rated Games Friday

events.description: Three round tournament for scholastic K-12 players
events.title: Charlotte Chess Center Friday Action Quads - South

events.description: Three round tournament for scholastic K-12 players
events.title: Charlotte Chess Center Sunday Action Quads

events.description: Tuesday nights G60+5 time control, first 50 players
events.title: Rated Game of the Week

events.description: Monthly blitz tournament, online format
events.title: Long Island Chess Central Blitz Championship

events.description: Four-round G/30;d5 tournament at Texas Chess Center
events.title: PLANO SWISS Tournament

events.description: Fast-paced blitz tournament, 7-9pm every Thursday
events.title: Chess Knight Weekly Blitz

events.description: One game Thursday evenings, 60 minutes + 5 second delay
events.title: Ballantyne Chess Klub King's Indian

events.description: FREE Quick-Rated three-round event, G/20 time control
events.title: Gainesville Wednesday Night Rapid

events.title: SuperUnited Croatia Rapid And Blitz
